meanings.sent1: The busied worker diligently completed his tasks.
meanings.sent2: She was always busied with her art projects.
meanings.sent3: The busied bee buzzed around the garden, collecting nectar.
meanings.sent4: The busied squirrel gathered nuts for the winter ahead.
meanings.sent5: The busied students focused intently on their assignments.

meanings.sent1: The busied chef prepared a delicious meal for the guests.
meanings.sent2: He felt busied by the many errands he had to run.
meanings.sent3: The busied mother juggled her children's schedules with ease.
meanings.sent4: The busied ant carried food back to its colony.
meanings.sent5: The busied firefighter rushed to put out the blazing fire.

meanings.definition: Kept busy or occupied with something
meanings.sent1: The busied students studied hard for their exams.
meanings.sent2: The busied worker barely had time for a break.
meanings.sent3: The busied cat chased after a playful ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The busied gardener tended to the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The busied mechanic fixed the car in record time.
